titles.title: To amend the Fraud Enforcement and Recovery Act of 2009 to require the Financial Crisis Inquiry Commission to make a preliminary report no later than June 15, 2010.
To amend the Fraud Enforcement and Recovery Act of 2009 to require the Financial Crisis Inquiry Commission to make a preliminary report no later than June 15, 2010.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: Amends the Fraud Enforcement and Recovery Act of 2009 (FERA) to require the Financial Crisis Inquiry Commission to submit a preliminary report on the current financial and economic crisis in the United States by June 15, 2010.
